titles: The cry of Sodom enquired into; upon occasion of the arraignment and condemnation of Benjamin Goad, for his prodigious villany. Together with a solemn exhortation to tremble at Gods judgements, and to abandon youthful lusts. S.D.
author: Danforth, Samuel, 1626-1674.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
